articles.description: Baldur's Gate 3 looks set to receive a new difficulty mode which will restrict players to one save file and permadeath.…
articles.content:
Baldur's Gate 3 looks set to receive a new difficulty mode which will restrict players to one save file and permadeath.
A new achievement for the game called Foehammer, which references an Honour mo… [+1654 chars]
